caption.p:
June–September ensemble mean climatology of 850-hPa wind (vectors, m
⋅
s −1) and absolute vorticity (shaded) from ( A) HIST. ( B) Difference between RCP8.5 and HIST simulations. ( C) Difference in MDGI due to absolute vorticity between RCP8.5 and HIST simulations. All based on HiRAM. Stippling in B represents statistically significant (at 5% level) changes in absolute vorticity for all ensemble members.
